fields.name: Dojo coupon code
fields.value: Use coupon code `KUTAM7BC` for 100% off any ElfHosted app, for a period of 3 days

fields.name: Available skillsets
fields.value: Ready to begin your training? Embark on one (or more) of the brave disciplines below:

fields.name: :crossed_swords: Social Samurai
fields.value:
--------------
You're a sharer - a Redditor, a tweeter of tweets, a tooter of toots, an... "influencer" (*shudder*). 

You tik the toks, and twitch the streams.

You know what a "personal brand" is. You know what an "alt" Reddit account is, how to upvote, and how to read the room.

You know that it's not about what you know, but what you know how to find!

fields.name: :lock: Debrid Demon
fields.value:
--------------
You're familiar with [Zurg](https://elfhosted.com/app/zurg), [RDTClient](https://elfhosted.com/app/rdtclient), and the "[Infinite Streaming](https://elfhosted.com/guides/media/)" guides. 

You know how to use Real-Debrid's UI, and to have your streamer libraries updated when new content arrives, using [Autoscan](https://elfhosted.com/app/autoscan/) or Zurg's plex_update.sh

(You know who *@yowmamasita* is :metal:)

fields.name: :pirate_flag: Arrgonaut
fields.value:
--------------
You're intimately familiar with the eccentricities of <:sonarr:492069283418079232> [Sonarr](https://elfhosted.com/app/sonarr/), <:radarr:803861879432019968> [Radarr](https://elfhosted.com/app/radarr/), and the lesser Aars. You can plumb them into NZB, torrent, and debrid downloaders. 

You know how to consolidate indexers / trackers using <:prowlarr:1119544922631049338> [Prowlarr](https://elfhosted.com/app/prowlarr/), use tags and priorities.

You know what a :trash: TRaSH guide is, and how to use it!

fields.name: :droplet: Torrent Titan
fields.value:
--------------
You're a master of the torrents. You understand seeders, leechers, trackers and ratios. You're know how to drive with <:qbittorrent:1119545012552728586> [qBittorrent](https://elfhosted.com/app/qbittorrent), <:deluge:1119543681205157978> [Deluge](https://elfhosted.com/app/nzbget), and even the janky <:rutorrent:1119545500362883072>  [ruTorrent](https://elfhosted.com/app/rutorrent).

You can make <:autobrr:1119543362702286879> [Autobrr](https://elfhosted.com/app/autobrr/) auto**purr**, you know how to order torrent clients with BYO VPN.

You know how to make use of ephemeral `/tmp` to speed up your downloads and reduce I/O.

fields.name: :ninja: NZB Ninja
fields.value:
--------------
You know how to setup providers, and indexers, you're comfortable with with <:sabnzbd:803862285772521472> [SABnzbd](https://elfhosted.com/app/sabnzbd) and <:nzbget:803861753548374077> [NZBGet](https://elfhosted.com/app/nzbget/), and know how to use <:prowlarr:1119544922631049338> [Prowlarr](https://elfhosted.com/app/prowlarr/) to tie it all together.

fields.name: :elf: Elf Lord
fields.value:
--------------
Your blood bleeds green. Your ears prick up (*haha*) at the sound of an elf in need. You've Subdued the  [Store](https://store.elfhosted.com), and you've Konquered the  [Kubernetes Dashboard](https://elfhosted.com/app/kubernetes-dashboard/). You relax with [rclone](https://elfhosted.com/app/rcloneui/) remotes and [migrations](https://elfhosted.com/how-to/migrate/).

 [ElfBot](https://elfhosted.com/app/elfbot/) is your lapdog, logs reveal themselves to you, and Discord is your domicile!

fields.name: How to graduate
fields.value:
--------------
If you feel you're ready, pick one of the options below for the **ULTIMATE TEST** (*a conversation with @funkypenguin*)

description:
Welcome, brave elf, to the ElfVengers Dojo! The purpose of this channel is to provide brave volunteers (you) with resources to get familiar with the ElfHosted apps / processes, so as to better help your fellow elves.

To this end, ElfHosted resources are free to you for a period of 3 days to trial (*and to surface bugs*), using the top secret coupon code below (*rotated occasionally*)
